actions.committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

official_title: For the relief of Michael Patrick McNamara and Thomas Parnell McNamara, Jr.

summary.text: Entitles two named Federal employees to: (1) competitive status; (2) have their appointments converted to unconditional career appointments; and (3) have their positions converted to Deputy U.S. Marshal positions. Provides for their retirement from Federal service.

titles.title: For the relief of Michael Patrick McNamara and Thomas Parnell McNamara, Jr.
